title: Reinstalling lol
body: Guys i deleted lol from my disk not with the uninstall a program from the control panel {{item:3070}}  I went to lol site and the installer says to me this " could not remove the older version of the game " . What do i do ? i tried cc cleaner but nothing ! Helppp {{champion:32}}

replies.body: It sounds like your folders can't be properly read anymore, but we have some resources to help!  I recommend running our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), which will provide some options for a full uninstall.  You should be able to go through the proper process of reinstalling the client after.  Hopefully, that will get you fixed up but let me know if you run into any issues.

Go into my computer
open C:
then riot games
delete all folders
(if unable restart your computer and try again)
If you have the launch still in your riot game folder run it and it should update and download everything you need
if not go on the official LOL site and download the game again
